column5: 1600 sq. ft. house with a screened back porch, front porch. It has 2 dbl. beds & 1 queen & 2 ba. It has all the amenities of home in the kitchen, with washer & dryer. Central ac-heat. Direct tv, dvds and free Wi-Fi. Continental breakfast is provided. We do not accept children under 10. However there are some special times we will allow animals, but a non-refundable deposit would be required and will pay to me, not thru Airbnb.
column8: This house sit on 5 peaceful acres
